forf.commands.message.timer.disabled: The PvP timer is not enabled in the config!
forf.commands.message.timer.disabledAndN: The PvP timer is not enabled in the config and Friend or Foe hasn't started yet!
forf.commands.message.start.insufficient: You can't start Friend or Foe without any players!
You can't start Friend or Foe with %s lives!
forf.commands.message.start.multiplePlay: Setting up Friend or Foe with %s lives and %s players
Setting up Friend or Foe with 1 life and %s players
forf.commands.message.start.multipleLive: Setting up Friend or Foe with %s lives and 1 player
forf.commands.message.start.single: Setting up Friend or Foe with 1 life and 1 player
forf.commands.message.leave.alreadyLeft: %s isn't added to Friend or Foe!
forf.commands.message.join.alreadyAdded: %s is already added to Friend or Foe!
forf.notStarted: Friend or Foe hasn't started yet!
forf.alreadyStarted: Friend or Foe has already started!
forf.disconnect.noSpectators: You must be a Friend or Foe member to join because spectators aren't allowed!
forf.disconnect.outOfLives: You have run out of lives and spectators aren't allowed!
forf.event.death.spectator: You have run out of lives! You are now a spectator
forf.event.death.lifeRemoved: %s has died! They are now at %s lives.
